ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.9'

about.description:
PySurfer is a Python library for visualizing cortical surface
representations of neuroimaging data. The package is primarily intended for
use with Freesurfer, but it can plot data that are drawn from a variety of
sources. PySurfer extends Mayavi’s powerful rendering engine with a
high-level interface for working with MRI and MEG data.

commands: xvfb-run -a python -c "import surfer; assert surfer.__version__ == '0.11.2', surfer.__version__"

about.description:
PySurfer is a Python library for visualizing cortical surface
representations of neuroimaging data. The package is primarily intended for
use with Freesurfer, but it can plot data that are drawn from a variety of
sources. PySurfer extends Mayavi’s powerful rendering engine with a
high-level interface for working with MRI and MEG data.

commands: xvfb-run -a python -c "import surfer; assert surfer.__version__ == '0.11.2', surfer.__version__"

name: pysurfer
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.11.2" %}
{% set sha256 = "277a72b0f8ae60c00f4d2702f33917cc6b225a36313fcead1aa119b45197d248" %}

package:
  name: pysurfer
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: pysurfer-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/p/pysurfer/pysurfer-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  number: 2
  noarch: python
  script:
    - python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - imageio
    - matplotlib-base
    - mayavi
    - nibabel
    - numpy
    - scipy

test:
  requires:
    - python {{ python_min }}
  commands:
    - "xvfb-run -a python -c \"import surfer; assert surfer.__version__ == '{{ version }}', surfer.__version__\""  # [linux]
    - "python -c \"import surfer; assert surfer.__version__ == '{{ version }}', surfer.__version__\""  # [not linux]

about:
  home: http://pysurfer.github.com
  license: BSD-3-Clause
  license_file: LICENSE
  license_family: BSD
  summary: Cortical surface visualization using Python
  description: |
    PySurfer is a Python library for visualizing cortical surface
    representations of neuroimaging data. The package is primarily intended for
    use with Freesurfer, but it can plot data that are drawn from a variety of
    sources. PySurfer extends Mayavi’s powerful rendering engine with a
    high-level interface for working with MRI and MEG data.
  doc_url: http://pysurfer.github.io
  dev_url: https://github.com/nipy/PySurfer/

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - christianbrodbeck
    - larsoner
